{
  "token_id": {{token_id}},  // TYPE = STRING 
  "token_amount": "token_amount or coin_amount", // TYPE = STRING, amount of microtokens/nanotokens "1000000"
  "side": "side", // VALUE = buy/sell
  "slippage": "PERCENT", // TYPE = STRING, 4 decimals (100 == 1%)
  "expected_price": "COIN_AMOUNT" // TYPE = STRING, amount of nanotons "1000000000"
}
